body_content.explanation: relating to the arrangements and work that is needed to control the operation of a plan or organization:
examples: Your responsibilities will be mainly administrative.

body_content.explanation: relating to the organization and structure of local government:
examples: Brittany is a cultural and administrative region in the north-west of France.
The villages had been omitted because they fell outside the administrative boundary of the region.

body_content.explanation: relating to the laws that control local government:
examples: In several countries, administrative law is distinguished from constitutional law by being concerned purely with matters of public administration.
Review by an administrative tribunal is generally to determine whether a decision taken by an executive authority breaches procedural rules.
